item.description:
Let's talk Turkey - as in a Turkish Restaurant in Waterbury that is getting rave reviews for their fresh and flavorful food. Well worth the trip, so come join us! Quite rare to find a Turkish place outside of New Haven and this one seems to be the best of the lot. The New Haven Advocate has a write-up you can read by clicking this link: http://www.newhavenad...

This meetup will be hosted by Megan and I will forward any emails you send to her. Looks like plenty of parking, and the restaurant is on the off ramp (Plank Rd) from I84 East - exit 25. If you are coming West on I84 - on the exit 25 ramp take a left at the Super 8 onto Scott Rd crossing the highway, next left puts you on Plank Rd. So easy to get to!

Some Ethnic Dining "Rules":

1) If you RSVP "YES" you are expected to SHOW UP!!! Be polite and make sure you change your RSVP by 1:00pm March 30th if need be. If you have to cancel or want to add yourself at the last minute call the restaurant to let them know (203) 591-8450

2) Please bring cash, it is so much quicker and easier. Remember, no one leaves until the bill is paid - this is respect for the event's host and the other diners.

3) I will collect $1.00 from each participant for Meetup fees.

4) This is a great group, we have a wonderful time at these events so let's keep the Organizer happy - come make me smile!

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Anatolia Restaurant 03/31/10 6:45pm Wednesday
